name: The Gatherer
credits:
MappyTheKat - Character art
Jedi - RUS translation
description:
Adds The Gatherer as a new playable character with 75 cards, 7 relics.

v0.8.0 (2019-03-01)
- Fixed bug where Toy Ornithoper healed you when you use Lesser Potions.
- Aroma Protection: Block increased 11(15) -> 12(16)
- Herbalism
  - Unupgraded Herbalism now gives maximum of 2 energy.
  - Upgrade Herbalism no longer gives you energy when there's no 2+ cost card in your hand.
- Flower Power: Cost reduced by 1 on all upgrade levels; now costs 1 normally and 0 when fully upgraded
- Black Tea: Rework - Cost 1(0). Gain 4 Strength. Lose 1 Dexterity. Startup: Gain a random Lesser Potion.
- Pick Ratio for Explorer's Path updated.

v0.8.1 (2019-03-01)
- Fixed bug where Mist Generator was giving you a rare potion each combat.

Visit https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/changelog/1611788501 for full change notes.
